name: Ninja Cat - Platformer Game (Mobile-friendly)
description:
Use your Ninja Skills™ to help Scratch Cat find delicious fish to eat! Now mobile-friendly!

CONTROLS (Keyboard):

WASD / arrow keys - move, jump, and climb walls!

SPACE - interact or attack.

R - reset to last checkpoint

M - return to main menu

CONTROLS (Mobile):

Tap/press above/left/right of the cat to move, jump, or climb walls.

Tap directly on the cat to interact or attack.

There are no resetting or return options for mobile yet, but you don't need them to beat the game.
